content: who said staying warm can t be fashionable create your own herringbone double hat with just one ball of chunky yarn and watch the compliments roll in with sizes from baby to adult large it s a perfect gift for anyone for that finishing touch we even have a matching scarf pattern get all wrapped up in style this winter check out my post for the free pattern or pop into my shop for an ad-free copy photo tutorial for herringbone double stitch https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/herringbone-double-crochet-stitch/ 1 pattern includes photo tutorial to show you how to add a hat brim to a regular beanie a video tutorial is also available you can watch the video tutorial on youtube here 2 two hat height options are included in each pattern size they are listed as **base of earlobe** slouch hat the base of earlobe row numbers will give you a hat that reaches to the base of the earlobe the slouch hat row will give you a longer slouch hat with a band you can turn up you can also make this as a regular beanie by working the pattern as written without adding the hat band > this pattern will be available as a > free pdf download until december 18 > 2023 at 11 59 pm et for cal >
